name: magic-guard

effect.x-y: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.

short_effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

flavor_text.x-y: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
